sentences.english: Hou Yiling, English literature professor at Beijing Foreign Studies University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 北京外国语大学英语系教授侯毅凌对此表示赞同。

sentences.english: I graduated from Shanghai International Studies University, my major is English, and i passed TEM-8 with a high mark.
sentences.chinese: 英语专业八级，上海外国语大学研究生毕业。

sentences.english: I study in Luohu Foreign Language School.
sentences.chinese: 我在罗湖外国语学校上学。

sentences.english: Besides English, we have to learn a second language.
sentences.chinese: 除了英语外，我们还须学习第二门外国语。

sentences.english: Recently, it is crazily said that Yike Zeng will go to study in Beijing International Studies University.
sentences.chinese: 最近网上疯传曾轶可要去北京第二外国语学院读书了。

sentences.english: I: Have you ever learned any other foreign languages other than English?
sentences.chinese: 除了英语，你还学过别的外国语吗？

sentences.english: Don't interpret it without real understanding when you study a foreign language.
sentences.chinese: 学习外国语切莫望文生义。

sentences.english: I feel very lucky that I can come to the HIU.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我很幸运能来到黑龙江外国语学院。

sentences.english: It was my good fortune to teach in the Overseas Training Department of Shang- hai International Studies University (SISU).
sentences.chinese: 我有幸在上海外国语大学海外培训部任教。

sentences.english: A foreign language is a weapon in the struggle of lfe.
sentences.chinese: 外国语是人生斗争的一种武器。

sentences.english: There's plenty of new thinking occurring everyday here at Beijing Foreign Studies University.
sentences.chinese: 天天在北京外国语大壆都有大批的新思维产生。

sentences.english: Graduated from Osaka University of Foreign Studies in 1960.
sentences.chinese: 深田静夫先生1960年毕业于大阪外国语大学。

sentences.english: I'm a student in Class One, Grade Seven of Jiajiang Foreign Language Experimental School.
sentences.chinese: 我是夹江外国语实验学校七年级一班的学生。

sentences.english: But his students at Beijing Foreign Studies University didn’t even try to hide their boredom.
sentences.chinese: 但他北京外国语大学的学生们毫不掩饰倦意。

sentences.english: Welcome to Shanghai Foreign Language School.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各位参观上海外国语学校。

sentences.english: The high - quality language teaching in SISU has been a long-established tradition and its distinguishing feature.
sentences.chinese: 高质量的语言教学是上海外国语大学的传统和特色。

definition: abbr. for 北京外國語大學|北京外国语大学[Bei3 jing1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]
Beijing Normal University/abbr. for 北京師範大學|北京师范大学[Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2

definition: abbr. for 北京第二外國語學院|北京第二外国语学院[Bei3 jing1 Di4 er4 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Xue2 yuan4]
attached (or affiliated) secondary (or middle) school/abbr. for 附屬中學|附属中学[fu4 shu3 zhong1 xue2]
abbr. for 上海外國語大學|上海外国语大学[Shang4 hai3 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]
abbr. for 廣東外語外貿大學|广东外语外贸大学[Guang3 dong1 Wai4 yu3 Wai4 mao4 Da4 xue2]
subsidiary primary school (originally attached to an institute, university etc)/abbreviation of 附屬小學|附属小学

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Yu3 yan2 Da4 xue2
